title: Request a Duplicate Policy Document
description: A policyholder has misplaced their physical life insurance policy and wants a new copy.

tasks.description: Process the request for a duplicate policy document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a copy of the policy contract.

tasks.description: Mail the new document to the policyholder's address of record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates the mailing of the physical document.
